## cilium envoy admin metrics

List Prometheus statistics of Envoy Proxy

```
cilium envoy admin metrics [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --filter string   Regex that should be used to filter metrics
  -h, --help            help for metrics
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

* [cilium envoy admin](cilium_envoy_admin.md)	 - Access Envoy Admin Interface
